title: Of libertie and necessitie a treatise, wherein all controversie concerning predestination, election, free-will, grace, merits, reprobation, &c. is fully decided and cleared, in answer to a treatise written by the Bishop of London-derry, on the same subject / by Thomas Hobs.
author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
publisher: Printed by W.B. for F. Eaglesfield ...,
